title: Respond to a Negative Online Review
description: A hotel manager needs to respond to a negative review on a travel website where a guest complained about noise.

tasks.description: Identify the guest's stay details from the information in the review.
tasks.expected_outcome: Manager successfully finds the guest's past reservation.

tasks.description: Draft a public response that is empathetic, apologizes for the specific issue, and avoids being defensive.
tasks.expected_outcome: A well-written, professional response is drafted.

tasks.description: Post the response to the review website and offer to connect with the guest offline to resolve the matter further.
tasks.expected_outcome: The response is posted, and it includes contact information for follow-up.
